name: Antibiotic stewardship: volume of antibiotic prescribing
title: Antibiotic stewardship: volume of antibiotic prescribing
description: Number of prescription items for all oral antibacterial drugs (BNF 5.1,
excluding antituberculosis drugs and antileprotic drugs) per oral antibacterials (BNF 5.1 sub-set) item-based STAR-PU.
y_label: Oral antibiotic items per antibacterial item-based STAR-PU
why_it_matters: Antibiotics play a critical role in modern medicines, as both a treatment of common infections and
for the prevention of infections, for example in patients undergoing surgery or chemotherapy.
Antimicrobial resistance therefore poses a significant threat to public health.
To help slow the development of resistance it is important that we don't overuse antibiotics.
This measure shows how many are being prescribed locally.
